org.buildmlearn.learnfrommap

Class ExploreMode.GestureListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.GestureDetector.SimpleOnGestureListener
      • org.buildmlearn.learnfrommap.ExploreMode.GestureListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.GestureDetector.OnDoubleTapListener, android.view.GestureDetector.OnGestureListener
    Enclosing class:
    ExploreMode

    public class ExploreMode.GestureListener
extends android.view.GestureDetector.SimpleOnGestureListener
    This class listens to various gestures performed on the world image, to select continents.
    Author:
    Abhishek
